description: Lists the usage modifications associated with a bill scenario.

parameters.name: billScenarioId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bill scenario to list usage modifications for.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Filters to apply to the list of usage modifications. (dict) --- Represents a filter for listing usage data. The name of the filter attribute. The values to filter by. (string) --- matchOption (string) --- The match option for the filter (e.g., equals, contains).

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter attribute.

nested_params.name: matchOption
nested_params.description: The match option for the filter (e.g., equals, contains).

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The list of usage modifications associated with the bill scenario.

nested_items.name: serviceCode
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services service code for this usage modification.

nested_items.name: usageType
nested_items.description: The type of usage being modified.

nested_items.name: operation
nested_items.description: The specific operation associated with this usage modification.

nested_items.name: location
nested_items.description: The location associated with this usage modification.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The availability zone associated with this usage modification, if applicable.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the usage modification.

nested_items.name: group
nested_items.description: The group identifier for the usage modification.

nested_items.name: usageAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with this usage modification.

nested_items.name: quantities
nested_items.description: The modified usage quantities.

nested_items.name: startHour
nested_items.description: The start hour of the usage period.

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: The unit of measurement for the usage quantity.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the usage quantity.

nested_items.name: historicalUsage
nested_items.description: Historical usage data associated with this modification, if available.

nested_items.name: serviceCode
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services service code associated with the usage.

nested_items.name: usageType
nested_items.description: The type of usage.

nested_items.name: operation
nested_items.description: The specific operation associated with the usage.

nested_items.name: location
nested_items.description: The location associated with the usage.

nested_items.name: usageAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with the usage.

nested_items.name: billInterval
nested_items.description: The time interval for the historical usage data.

nested_items.name: start
nested_items.description: The start date and time of the interval.

nested_items.name: end
nested_items.description: The end date and time of the interval.

nested_items.name: filterExpression
nested_items.description: An optional filter expression to apply to the historical usage data.

nested_items.name: and
nested_items.description: A list of expressions to be combined with AND logic.

nested_items.name: or
nested_items.description: A list of expressions to be combined with OR logic.

nested_items.name: costCategories
nested_items.description: Filters based on cost categories.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key or attribute to filter on.

nested_items.name: matchOptions
nested_items.description: The match options for the filter (e.g., equals, contains).
(string) ---

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: The values to match against.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: dimensions
nested_items.description: Filters based on dimensions (e.g., service, operation).

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key or attribute to filter on.

nested_items.name: matchOptions
nested_items.description: The match options for the filter (e.g., equals, contains).
(string) ---

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: The values to match against.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key or attribute to filter on.

nested_items.name: matchOptions
nested_items.description: The match options for the filter (e.g., equals, contains).
(string) ---

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: The values to match against.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token to retrieve the next page of results, if any.
